CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName, "BankRemittance", "1 - Client", "OtherRevenue", "2 - Autre recette", "Unpaid", "3 - Impayé", "BankFees", "4 - Frais bancaire", "CashWithdrawal", "5 - Retrait espèce", "HeadOfficeTransfer", "6 - Virement siège", "BankRemittanceCancellation", "7 - Annulation remise", "VATDifference", "8 - Ecart conversion", "OtherExpence", "9 - Autre dépense", RecordType.Name)
CustomField.label: Type
